message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12,000. I believe this is a great value considering the product's quality and features.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the price, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm happy to purchase the product for $10,500.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to pay a bit less, but I'm not willing to go below $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a compromise at $11,250. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
